      • purchaseCoupon

        public void purchaseCoupon(long customerId,
                           long couponId)
                    throws CouponSystemException
        Description copied from interface: CustomerDAO
        Registers a specified coupon to a specified customer by ID.
        Specified by:
        purchaseCoupon in interface CustomerDAO
        Parameters:
        customerId - the Id of the customer.
        couponId - the Id of the coupon.
        Throws:
        CouponSystemException - if coupon with specified Id doesn't exist, if coupon was already purchased by the customer with specified Id, if the coupon is out of stock, if coupons' expiration date has already passed or if communication IO failed.
